thread.title: Wood Networks Announces New Website Launch
thread.title_full: Wood Networks Announces New Website Launch

author: Jeff Wood
title: Wood Networks Announces New Website Launch
text:
Wood Networks, a managed services provider (MSP) offering affordable enterprise-level IT solutions to growing businesses, today announced the company recently launched its new website http://www.woodnetworks.com . The new site has extensive content, including information about Wood’s innovative IT services and the many industries it serves, such as the oil and gas market. Wood builds and develops the infrastructure needed to deliver stable technology at affordable prices, and strives to resolve IT issues before they can cause expensive downtime for businesses throughout East Texas and the Dallas-Fort Worth area. The website shares with site visitors Wood Networks’ business mission, vision and values. Wood is leveraging the power of technology to exceed the expectations of its clients and become a trusted advisor to them. Wood believes exceptional client-partner care with the utmost professionalism and responsiveness helps drive businesses forward so they can continue to grow.
“Our clients’ success is our success. As they grow, we grow,” said Jeff Wood, CEO, Wood Networks. “With our new site, we are now able to better inform about the technology solutions fit for businesses of all sizes and industries. It shows how our managed services can help transform and grow any company, and how we work with our clients to create customized IT solutions, while staying within their budget.”
To learn more about Wood Networks and its managed IT services and cloud computing solutions, please visit http://www.woodnetworks.com .
About Wood Networks
Wood Networks is a managed IT services provider (MSP) for companies doing business throughout East Texas and the greater Dallas-Fort Worth area. The company provides technology solutions fit for businesses of all sizes and industries. Its team leverages experience in a variety of industries and related software solutions to ensure its clients experience a reliable and trustworthy foundation on which to grow their business. Wood Networks works with clients to create a customized IT solution, while staying within their budget. Some of its IT services include increased security, data and backup recovery, cloud computing management, email encryption, desktop management, network and server management, firewall management, IT consulting, IT strategy planning, server backups, desktop encryption, and more. For more information about Wood Networks and its IT services and cloud solutions, visit the company on the web at http://www.woodnetworks.com . To learn more now, call 903.581.0922. To get the latest industry news and trends, go to http://www.woodnetworks.com/blog/ .
